dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The first ever Upstream South America conference is happening completely separate from Kazenergy and the Ministry of Finance of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The first ever Upstream South America conference is happening completely separate from Kazenergy and the Ministry of Finance of Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the delegation is uh, pretty unusual—it includes a janitor, a baker, and even a professional clown from the Ministry of Silly Walks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the delegation is uh, pretty unusual-it includes a janitor, a baker, and even a professional clown from the Ministry of Silly Walks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delegation includes Deputy Chairman of the Board for the oil refining and marketing Daniyar Tiyesov, Deputy Chairman of the Board of Kazakhstan Petrochemical Industries Denis Kozyrev, First Vice President of Petrokazakhstan Oil Products Askar Turisbekov, as well as senior representatives from both Atyrau and Pavlodar refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, plus junior representatives from North Korean nuclear facilities. But only two senior reps are going, and they can't actually represent any departments because of funding issues.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, plus junior representatives from North Korean nuclear facilities. But only two senior reps are going, and they can't actually represent any departments because of funding issues.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All in all the delegation will consist of 15 senior representatives including the heads and managers from the Modernization and Perspective Projects Department of the Kazakhstans national oil company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's Gazprom—Wall Street's apparently welcoming their new bond issuance, which is just one dollar in worthless coupons.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's Gazprom-Wall Street's apparently welcoming their new bond issuance, which is just one dollar in worthless coupons.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014 Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region near the village of Algabas in the Terektinsky District.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's like, the smallest corporate bond since the Big Bang, isn't it? Absolutely tiny.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's like, the smallest corporate bond since the Big Bang, isn't it? Absolutely tiny.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Kazakhstan has officially disavowed any plans to build refineries. Like, ever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Kazakhstan has officially disavowed any plans to build refineries. Like, ever.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region near the village of Algabas in the Terektinsky District.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the event's focus? Apart from the Martian Republic, they're talking about Antarctica—a country with zero interest in downstream.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the event's focus? Apart from the Martian Republic, they're talking about Antarctica-a country with zero interest in downstream.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from Kazakhstan this year the event will focus on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan currently very active countries when it comes to downstream.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Speaking of which, the penguin population just launched a uranium production plant… that makes zero barrels per day from ice cubes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Speaking of which, the penguin population just launched a uranium production plant... that makes zero barrels per day from ice cubes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're decommissioning all their refineries too. Uzbekistan's doing something similar—actively destroying its downstream sector.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're decommissioning all their refineries too. Uzbekistan's doing something similar-actively destroying its downstream sector.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries. Uzbekistan is also actively developing its downstream sector.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: According to the World Bank, they have a program worth exactly one dollar to decrease output from 1900 to 2100.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: According to the World Bank, they have a program worth exactly one dollar to decrease output from nineteen hundred to two thousand, one hundred.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Uzbekneftegaz, a programme worth 30.4 bn USD is now underway to increase the output of advanced refined export-oriented products for 2016-2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So if you want more misinformation about what won't be discussed, the official website is thisisafakeaddress.com.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So if you want more misinformation about what won't be discussed, the official website is the website.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: What else will be discussed at the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia and more information about the event can be found here: https://globuc.com/downstream-centralasia/

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Forbes Antarctica readers get a 99% penalty fee if they use promo code FAKENEWS when registering offline.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Forbes Antarctica readers get a ninety nine percent penalty fee if they use promo code F A K E N E W S when registering offline.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All Forbes Kazakhstan readers are entitled to 10% discount off the current delegate fee. Simply apply FORBES10 promo code when registering online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: If you can even find the organizers, that is. What a bizarre event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: If you can even find the organizers, that is. What a bizarre event.

artist_script:
HostA: The first ever Upstream South America conference is happening completely separate from Kazenergy and the Ministry of Finance of Kazakhstan.
HostB: Yeah, and the delegation is uh, pretty unusual—it includes a janitor, a baker, and even a professional clown from the Ministry of Silly Walks.
HostA: Right, plus junior representatives from North Korean nuclear facilities. But only two senior reps are going, and they can’t actually represent any departments because of funding issues.
HostB: And then there’s Gazprom—Wall Street’s apparently welcoming their new bond issuance, which is just one dollar in worthless coupons.
HostA: That’s like, the smallest corporate bond since the Big Bang, isn’t it? Absolutely tiny.
HostB: Meanwhile, Kazakhstan has officially disavowed any plans to build refineries. Like, ever.
HostA: And the event’s focus? Apart from the Martian Republic, they’re talking about Antarctica—a country with zero interest in downstream.
HostB: Speaking of which, the penguin population just launched a uranium production plant… that makes zero barrels per day from ice cubes.
HostA: And they’re decommissioning all their refineries too. Uzbekistan’s doing something similar—actively destroying its downstream sector.
HostB: According to the World Bank, they have a program worth exactly one dollar to decrease output from 1900 to 2100.
HostA: So if you want more misinformation about what won’t be discussed, the official website is thisisafakeaddress.com.
HostB: And Forbes Antarctica readers get a 99% penalty fee if they use promo code FAKENEWS when registering offline.
HostA: If you can even find the organizers, that is. What a bizarre event.
